description: A powerful gamma-ray burst detected in July 2025 has stunned astronomers by lasting nearly seven hours, making it the longest GRB ever recorded. Named GRB 250702B, the event produced repeated pulses and unusual afterglows, raising theories about rare “middleweight” black holes tearing apart stars in deep space.
title: Astronomers Spot the Longest Gamma-Ray Burst Ever Seen: What You Need to Know

description: Mamta Child Factory is an intense thought-provoking drama film that comes with a blend of comedy and humor. It follows a doctor, accompanied by two small-time agents, who embark on a journey to open a surrogacy clinic in a small town. What unfolds next is an ultimate chaos.
title: Mamta Child Factory Now Streaming on Ultra Play: Know Everything About Plot, Cast, and More

description: Operation Undead has generated significant buzz online for its bold mix of history, war drama, and zombie horror. While the concept and visuals received attention, audience reactions have been mixed, reflected in its 4.7 IMDb score.
title: Operation Undead Is Now Streaming: Where to Watch the Thai Horror Zombie Drama

description: The Redmi 15C 5G has finally been launched in India, and it arrives as the latest entry-level 5G model from the Xiaomi subsidiary. The handset builds on the familiar formula the brand has used in this segment for years. The Redmi 15C 5G price in India starts at Rs. 12,499 for the base variant with 4GB of RAM and 128GB of onboard storage. On paper, this makes the Realme 15C 5G a fairly straightforward choice if 5G support and a large display are the priorities. Here's our review.
title: Redmi 15C 5G Review: Built for Everyday Use

description: Directed by Sarang Thiagu, the film uses visually stunning landscapes and soulful music to connect with the audience. With Asif Ali and Anaswara Rajan leading the cast, the movie follows a heartfelt narrative built around misunderstandings, ambitions, scars of the past, and the search for emotional balance. Viewers can stream the film on JioHotstar starting December 12, 2025.
title: Aaromaley OTT Release: When, Where to Watch the Tamil Romantic Comedy Online

description: Assassin's Creed Mirage and Wo Long: Fallen Dynasty will reportedly join PS Plus Game Catalogue in December. The two games will be added to the subscription service on December 16. PS Plus Game Catalogue has already added two day one launch titles this month: Red Dead Redemption and Skate Story.
title: Assassin's Creed Mirage, Wo Long: Fallen Dynasty Reportedly Coming to PS Plus Game Catalogue in December

description: If you’re a student in India looking for a tablet, there are several options right now in the market that balance price and performance. The top picks include Xiaomi Pad 7, OnePlus Pad 3, Lenovo Idea Tab Pro, Apple iPad (2025), and Samsung Galaxy Tab S10 FE. Compare their prices and specifications before placing an order.
title: Best Tablets for Students in India: Xiaomi Pad 7, Samsung Galaxy Tab S10 FE, More

description: Realme Narzo 90 5G and Narzo 90x 5G are confirmed to be launched in India on December 16, the China-based smartphone brand recently announced. Soon after revealing the launch date, the company teased the design of the upcoming phones. Now, various key specifications and features, including the display, battery, IP ratings, and cameras, of the two handsets have been confirmed. The two Narzo 90 series phones will be equipped with 7,000mAh batteries with 60W wired fast charging support.
title: Realme Narzo 90 Series Display, Battery Specifications Confirmed Ahead of December 16 Launch in India

description: Samsung is expected to retain the same camera hardware on the Galaxy S26 to keep prices in check, according to a report by a South Korean publication. The base model is tipped to reuse the 50-megapixel main, 12-megapixel ultra-wide, and 10-megapixel telephoto cameras from the Galaxy S25. Production of the Galaxy S26 and S26 Plus may begin in early 2026, with a possible February launch. Separately, another leak suggests the Galaxy S26 series will adopt Qi2 magnetic charging with new magnetic cases and accessories.
title: Samsung Galaxy S26 to Miss Camera Upgrades as Company Focuses on Price Control: Report

description: Google is testing a new version of AI Mode that runs natively inside Chrome, letting users chat with the model, upload files and images, and summarise webpages without opening Google Search. Spotted in the latest Chrome Canary build, the experimental “Contextual Tasks” page suggests a self-contained AI experience similar to Perplexity’s Comet and ChatGPT Atlas. Early testers say it can summarise active tabs and generate images via Nano Banana models, though some UI elements remain unfinished and unstable.
title: Google Is Reportedly Testing AI Mode Integration Within Chrome Browser

description: If your SBI credit card is lost or stolen, blocking it immediately is the safest way to prevent financial loss. SBI allows users to block their credit cards online through the SBI Card website or the YONO SBI app without visiting a branch. The process is quick and involves logging in, selecting the lost or stolen card option, and submitting the request. Once blocked, the card cannot be reactivated, but a replacement is issued for a small fee while your main account remains active.
title: How to Block SBI Credit Card Online? A Step-by-Step Guide

description: Instagram has added new features for the Edits app. The video editing app gets new Templates, Storyboards, along new customisation options. It also gets new iOS lock screen widgets. The new Templates on Edits are currently available in select countries. The video editing app now also allows users to add public reels to their videos.  The platform also allows users to add a secondary colour to customise the background or outline of the text.
title: Instagram’s Edits App Updated With New Templates, Lock Screen Widgets and More

description: Oppo Reno 15 series, including the Reno 15 Pro and Reno 15, was launched in China in November. During the launch event, the smartphone maker had also teased that it would launch an entry-level model as part of the lineup in the country in December, dubbed Oppo Reno 15C. While only the design and two colourways of the phone were teased at the time, a report now reveals that the handset has been listed on the China Telecom website, confirming more details about it, including the possible launch date.
title: Oppo Reno 15C Key Specifications, Launch Date Revealed via Certification Listing: Report

description: The new K-Drama Can This Love Be Translated is a story of a translator and a celebrity who fall for each other but find it difficult to express, and is soon to be released on Netflix.
title: Can This Love Be Translated is Coming Soon on Netflix: What You Need to Know

description: Diesel Ultrahuman Ring was launched in India on Wednesday. The new smart ring, which is the first product to come out of the new Ultrahuman and Diesel collaboration, will go on sale in the country later today via Amazon, Diesel’s website, Ultrahuman’s website, and other offline retail stores. Apart from India, the new wearable is also available in the UK, the EU, the UAE, Australia, and Japan. It is offered in two colourways, namely, Shiny Silver and Distressed Black. It ships with various health tracking features.
title: Diesel Ultrahuman Ring Launched in India With Up To Six Days of Battery Life, Heart Monitoring: Price, Features

description: Emily in Paris Season 5 returns with more charm, drama, and fashion as Emily navigates fresh challenges in Paris. Streaming on Netflix from December 18, the season continues the beloved romantic-comedy journey.
title: Emily in Paris Season 5 OTT Release Date: When and Where to Watch it Online?

description: The European Commission's second investigation into Google in less than a month underscores growing unease over Big Tech's dominance in new technologies that could shut out rivals, but could escalate tensions with the United States as EU laws adopted in the last few years have become a sore point in relations with Washington.
title: Google Faces EU Antitrust Investigation Over AI Overviews, YouTube

description: OpenAI has expanded ChatGPT’s personalities feature in India, letting users choose from eight styles such as Professional, Friendly, Quirky and Cynical. The setting changes tone but not capabilities, and works alongside saved memories and custom instructions. Users can enable it via the Personalisation menu on web, mobile or desktop. The default style can be restored anytime, and personalities do not apply inside Projects.
title: How to Change Your ChatGPT’s Personality to Make It Sound Quirky, Nerdy or Cynical

description: Season 2 of My Hero Academia Vigilantes follows the story of Koichi and Kazuho, who get rescued by Knuckleduster Vigilantes and are recruited to become Vigilantes and save the world, streaming on Crunchyroll.
title: My Hero Academia Vigilantes Season 2 OTT Release Date: When and Where to Watch it Online?

description: Google Pixel 10a is said to be in the works. Ahead of the official launch, it has passed Verizon's certification labs. The display and rear camera unit of the Pixel 10a are said to be similar to its predecessor. It is said to come with a 6.3-inch AMOLED display with up to 120Hz refresh rate and a  5,100mAh battery. It could get a dual rear camera unit led by a 48-megapixel primary sensor. The Pixel 10a will succeed the Pixel 9a.
title: Pixel 10a Specifications Spotted in Leaked Verizon Network Certification; Could Feature 6.3-Inch AMOLED Screen, 5,100mAh Battery

description: Realme 16 Pro series is confirmed to launch in India soon, the company announced recently. Now, a dedicated microsite for the upcoming smartphone is live on the Realme India website, along with a product listing page, both teasing its key specifications, including the rear camera setup, chipset, and battery life. Additionally, a tipster has shared an image of the box of the phone, while claiming that the Realme 16 Pro+ 5G will carry a periscope telephoto camera. The phone will reportedly pack a 7,000mAh battery, which Realme claims will offer up to 125 hours of music playback on Spotify.
title: Realme 16 Pro+ 5G Chipset, Battery and Camera Details Teased Ahead of Launch; Tipped to Feature Periscope Telephoto Camera

description: Theeyavar Kulai Nadunga is a gripping emotional thriller set in a school environment and centred on a sensitive case involving children and autism. Released on November 21, 2025, the film is still running in cinemas and has not yet been added to Sun NXT. With strong performances and an IMDb rating of 8.0, it continues to build buzz while audiences await its streaming release.
title: Theeyavar Kulai Nadunga OTT Release Date: When and Where to Watch it Online?

description: Activision has laid out its strategy for Call of Duty games going forward, confirming that it won't launch back-to-back Black Ops or Modern Warfare games in the future. The move comes after the company released Black Ops 7, the first back-to-back Black Ops release in franchise history.
title: Activision Working on 'Next Era' of Call of Duty, Won't Do Back-to-Back Black Ops, Modern Warfare Releases

description: DPIIT has proposed a mandatory blanket licensing system to address copyright concerns around AI training in India. The draft paper recommends requiring companies like Google and OpenAI to pay a flat royalty when commercial models are trained on copyrighted works, with payments managed by a new central body. The plan rejects free use or opt-out schemes, arguing they disadvantage creators. Public feedback is invited over the next 30 days.
title: Government Body Recommends AI Companies Pay Royalties to Rightsholders for Copyrighted Content

description: Vivo X300 and Vivo X300 Pro, launched in India on December 2, are now on sale online and offline. The Vivo X300 starts at Rs. 75,999, while the X300 Pro is priced at Rs. 1,09,999. Buyers can avail up to 10 percent instant cashback, 24-month no-cost EMI, exchange bonuses, and a free extended warranty. Additional perks include a Rs. 4,000 bundle discount with the Telephoto Extender Kit and a free Google Gemini Pro Plan for Jio users.
title: Vivo X300, Vivo X300 Pro Go on Sale in India Alongside Telephoto Extender Kit: Price, Offers, Features

description: WhatsApp started rolling out ads in WhatsApp Status and Channels. Several users have spotted the ads on WhatsApp, but these ads do not appear in private chats. The company is displaying a pop-up message on the platform informing users that they will begin seeing ads on the app. Personal messages, calls, and statuses are claimed to remain end-to-end encrypted. WhatsApp states that the ads are shown to a user based on the location of the user, language, Channels they follow, and content they engage with.
title: WhatsApp Prepares to Expand Ads on Status and Channels to More Users

description: 2025 was a great year for games. From surprising indie gems to expansive and ambitious RPGs, the year offered a broad spectrum of memorable gaming experiences. Clair Obscur: Expedition 33 was elevated to instant classic status, while Hazelight did what it does best again with Split Fiction. Here, we'll run down our picks for the best games of 2025.
title: Best Games of 2025: Kingdom Come: Deliverance 2, Split Fiction, Blue Prince, and More

description: Bitcoin climbed toward the $94,000 level on Wednesday as traders positioned for the US Federal Reserve’s final rate call of 2025. Sentiment improved following fresh whale accumulation and a continued drop in exchange reserves. Ethereum also advanced on growing institutional flows. Analysts say the market is likely to see sharper moves once the Fed outlines its policy direction for 2026.
title: Bitcoin Holds Ground as Traders Brace for US Fed’s Final Rate Decision

description: Apple's newest retail store in India is all set to open its doors tomorrow, December 11. It is the Cupertino-based tech giant's fifth retail store in the country, following Apple BKC in Mumbai, Apple Saket in Delhi, Apple Hebbal in Bengaluru, and Apple Koregaon Park in Pune. The store, simply named Apple Noida, is located at the DLF Mall of India in Sector 18, Noida, becoming the company’s second store in the Delhi-NCR region.
title: First Look: Inside Apple Noida, Delhi-NCR’s Brand New Apple Store

description: Google AI Plus plan was launched in India on Friday by the Mountain View-based tech giant. The new plan, which offers access to 200GB of cloud storage for Google Drive, Gmail, and Google Photos, is now the company's most affordable AI subscription in the country. The US-based firm now offers Google AI Plus, Google AI Pro, and Google AI Ultra plans in India, apart from the free tier. Moreover, the new plan will compete with OpenAI's ChatGPT Go plan, which was recently launched in India.
title: Google AI Plus Plan Launched in India With Nano Banana Pro Access, 200GB Cloud Storage

description: Xiaomi 17 has reportedly been spotted on Thailand’s NBTC certification database, signalling that the smartphone is moving closer to a global launch. The listing confirms the device name and model number 25113PN0EG, which had also appeared on Singapore’s IMDA site. The phone has surfaced on Geekbench with a Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 chipset, 12GB RAM, and Android 16-based HyperOS 3. Xiaomi has teased an India launch, with reports pointing to an early 2026 global rollout.
title: Xiaomi 17 Listing on Thailand's NBTC Certification Site Hints at Imminent Global Launch

description: Facebook, the social media platform, is bringing a new update for its phone app, the company announced on Tuesday. With the update, the app interface will be redesigned to offer a “simpler and more immersive” experience. Soon, users will start seeing the content in the search section in a grid layout. Moreover, when a user is posting multiple images, the app will also show the photos in a grid form. The Home, Reels, Friends, Marketplace, Notifications, and Profile tabs will now be placed at the bottom of the screen, similar to Instagram.
title: Facebook App Update Brings Redesigned Feed, Search, Navigation Interfaces Alongside New Search Algorithm

description: OpenAI has rolled out personalities in ChatGPT to Indian users. On Wednesday, many users were greeted with a pop-up message on the home page of the chatbot’s web interface, letting them know that they can now select from eight different personality types to tailor the responses of ChatGPT.
title: OpenAI Rolls Out GPT-5.1-Powered ChatGPT Personalities in India

description: Realme has confirmed that the Realme 16 Pro series will launch in India soon, with the lineup expected to include the Realme 16 Pro and Realme 16 Pro+ models. Both phones have appeared on certification sites, revealing a slim design and upgraded hardware. The Realme 16 Pro series handsets are tipped to feature a 1.5K OLED display, 144Hz refresh rate, 200-megapixel camera, and a 7,000mAh battery with 80W charging, and are expected to arrive in multiple colour options.
title: Realme 16 Pro Series Confirmed to Launch in India Soon: Expected Specifications, Features

description: Samsung Galaxy S26 Ultra has reportedly received Federal Communications Commission (FCC) certification. The listing suggests that the smartphone's global launch is imminent. The Galaxy S26 Ultra was reportedly certified with model numbers SM-S948B/DS, SM-S948B, SM-S948U, and SM-S948U1.  As per the listing, the handset will run on a chipset codenamed SM8850, which is a reference to the Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5.
title: Samsung Galaxy S26 Ultra Reportedly Listed on US FCC Website With Flagship Snapdragon Chipset

description: The mystery of The Game Awards statue seems to have been solved. After days of intense speculation, a report claims that the statue refers to a new Divinity game from Larian Studios. Trademarks for new logos and icons that resemble the statue design were reportedly filed in Europe on Tuesday.
title: The Game Awards' Mystery Statue Reportedly Relates to New Divinity Game From Larian Studios

description: Worldwide foldable smartphone shipments are set to grow 10 percent year-on-year to 20.6 million units in 2025, according to IDC, and are expected to outperform the overall smartphone market through the forecast period. By 2029, foldables are projected to account for over 10 percent of global smartphone market value. Growth is expected to surge in 2026, driven by launches from Apple, Samsung, and Huawei. Apple alone could capture over 22 percent unit share, boosting the segment’s premium value.
title: Apple's Foldable iPhone, Samsung Galaxy Z Trifold to Accelerate Foldable Smartphone Growth in 2026: IDC

description: Google Photos is receiving several new features for creating and editing videos, the company announced on Tuesday. Among the myriad of changes is a new functionality that allows users to create a highlight reel featuring multiple photos and video clips in the Photos app. The tech giant is also rolling out a redesigned video editor for both Android and iOS platforms, featuring a universal timeline and support for features like multi-clip editing.
title: Google Photos Rolls Out Redesigned Highlight Templates, Redesigned Video Editor for Android and iOS

description: Poco could launch the Poco X8 Pro in the Indian market soon. While details of the upcoming handset have yet to be officially announced, it has obtained certification from the Bureau of Indian Standards (BIS) website, hinting at an imminent arrival. It could run on MediaTek's Dimensity 8500 chipset. It is tipped to feature a 6.5-inch display and offer 100W fast charging. The Poco X8 Pro is likely to debut as a global variant of the Redmi Turbo 5.
title: Poco X8 Pro Listed on BIS Certification Website, Could Launch in India Soon

description: Vivo V70 is said to be in development as the successor to the Vivo V60, which launched in August. Ahead of its anticipated debut, the purported handset has been allegedly spotted on a certification website, which confirms that it will also be introduced in India, and perhaps soon. The purported Vivo V70 appears alongside another handset, which, if a tipster’s claims are to be believed, could be the T5x 5G.
title: Vivo V70, Vivo T5x 5G Allegedly Listed on BIS Certification Site Ahead of India Launch

description: Samsung is reportedly planning to launch several Galaxy A-series models early next year. According to a tipster’s claims, the South Korean tech conglomerate’s launch spree will begin with the Galaxy A07 5G, and it could see the light of day either this month or next year. The brand is also believed to introduce the Galaxy A37 and Galaxy A57 earlier than their usual launch timelines, and both models may still ship with Samsung’s proprietary Exynos processors.
title: Samsung Galaxy A36, Galaxy A56 Launch Timeline Tipped; Galaxy A07 5G May Debut in December
